revised_title: Observations of Luminous Emanations from Human Bodies and Brutes
tldr: The author, Henry Miles, shares his observations of luminous emanations from human bodies and animals, discussing their connection to electricity. He describes a case where Mrs. Susanna Sewall's clothing sparked with electricity, and how the phenomenon was studied and documented. The author also mentions the work of Bartholin, who hypothesized that the principles of fermentation could be the cause of these luminous effluvia in animals.
